name: oidcsessioncheck
description: JavaScript library to assist with binding sessions between an OIDC OP and RP

scripts.build: browserify --s SessionCheck -o sessionCheckGlobal.js sessionCheck.js && babel --out-file sessionCheckGlobal.js sessionCheckGlobal.js && browserify -o sessionCheckFrame.js sessionCheckFrame.src.js && babel --out-file sessionCheckFrame.js sessionCheckFrame.js

author: Jake Feasel
